anchorMove.name: Channel the Unknown
anchorMove.description: Tap into mysterious forces beyond mortal understanding

outcomes.13+: The forces obey your will completely
outcomes.7-9: You channel the power, but at a cost

flaw.name: Otherworldly Connection
flaw.description: The forces you channel leave their mark on you, making it hard to relate to normal people

flaw.name: Too Much Truth
flaw.description: Sometimes seeing through all deceptions reveals truths you wish you didn't know

anchorMove.name: Rational Mind
anchorMove.description: Use logic and reason to solve problems

flaw.name: Overthinking
flaw.description: Your logical mind sometimes paralyzes you with too many possibilities

flaw.name: Pattern Obsession
flaw.description: You sometimes see patterns where none exist, leading you astray
